Online communities, such as social media and forums, have played a

significant role in the spread of flat Earth theories. These platforms allow

proponents to connect with like-minded individuals and share information that

supports their views (The Rise of Flat Earth on Social Media). Additionally,

online communities can provide a sense of belonging and validation for flat

Earth believers.
